A git of demo

![](https://media.giphy.com/media/drXGoW1iudhKw/giphy.gif)

You can add text 

* and lists 
* with extra bullets

You can *format* and **bold**

Also still use R.

```{r}
library(tidyverse)

plot_df =
  tibble(
    x=runif(100),
    y=1+2*x+rnorm(100)
  )

plot_df |>
  ggplot(aes(x=x,y=y))+
  geom_point()
```
